DOC.criteria: Biopsyproven squamous cell carcinoma oropharynx ( tonsillar pillar , tonsillar fossa , soft palate , base tongue ) . Stagegrouping : Stage I ( T1N0 ) Stage II ( T2N0 ) Favorable Stage III ( T1N1/T2N1 ) select stage IV ( T1T2 early N2b ) 2 less lymph node 2 less cm diameter lymph node Unfavorable stage III select stage IV ( T , N2c/N3 ) Surgery primary tumor/lymph node limit incisional/excisional biopsy . Will receive treatment proton radiation . Evidence distant metastasis . Previous irradiation head neck cancer .
